means: （线条、运动的物体等）会于一点

sentence.Network_en: As they flow south, the five rivers converge.
Our previously opposed views are beginning to converge.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们原来相互对立的观点开始趋于一致.

PerfectNetExp.abs: iBT托福阅读1200词汇 - 豆丁网 ... conurbation \n. 有卫星城的大都市 converge \v. 聚合, 集中于一点 \ convert \n. 皈依者 \.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... evolve（ 演化，逐渐发展）； converge（ 会聚，集中）； avert（ 避开，避免）；.
模具英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... L9 contour 轮廓 L4 converge 集中于一点 L7 conveyer 运送装置.
全新版大学英语综合教程第三册单词汇总_百度文库 ... naked 裸体的，赤条条的 converge 会合；集中 terminal 终点，终端机.

list.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... convention ? n. 大会,惯例 convergent ? adj. 收敛的，聚合 conversant ? adj. 熟悉的，亲近的.
//收敛（convergence）：网络由不稳定到稳定的过程。 //收敛时间：收敛过程持续的时间 ③收敛时间短，一般小于10S ④100%无环 …
会聚（Convergence）是指三个电子束无论在无扫描状态（静态）下，还是在有扫描状态（动态）下，在任何位置上都能从一个荫罩 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from late Latin convergere, from con- 'together' + Latin vergere 'incline'

entry.def: If people or vehicles converge on a place, they move towards it from different directions.

example.ex: Competitors from more than a hundred countries have converged on Sheffield for the Games...
example.tran: 来自100多个国家的选手齐聚设菲尔德参加此次运动会。

example.ex: Hundreds of coaches will converge on the capital.
example.tran: 数百辆长途汽车将会在首都汇集。

entry.def: If roads or lines converge, they meet or join at a particular place.

example.ex: As they flow south, the five rivers converge.

entry.tran: (不同的思想、社会等)趋同，趋于一致，融合
entry.def: If different ideas or societies converge, they stop being different and become similar to each other.

example.ex: Speeches delivered by Mr Dewar and Mr Wallace indicated their views were converging...
example.tran: 杜瓦先生和华莱士先生发表的讲话表明他们的观点越来越接近了。

example.ex: The views of the richest householders converged with those of the poorest and created a new consensus.
example.tran: 最富的房主和最穷的房主观点趋于一致，达成了新的共识。

means.word_mean: 2. approach a limit as the number of terms increases without limit
3. move or draw together at a certain location;

sentences.sentence: "The crowd converged on the movie star"

means.word_mean: 4. come together so as to form a single product;

sentences.sentence: "Social forces converged to bring the Fascists back to power"

auth_sentence.content: Browser defaults may converge on something more privacy-protective.
auth_sentence.res_content: Browser defaults may converge on something more privacy-protective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Browser defaults may converge on something more privacy-protective.

auth_sentence.content: Recent developments in theology converge with components of contemporary management theory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recent developments in theology converge with components of contemporary management theory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recent developments in theology converge with components of contemporary management theory.

auth_sentence.content: Euramerica and Gondwana were beginning to converge into what would become Pangea.
auth_sentence.res_content: Euramerica and Gondwana were beginning to converge into what would become Pangea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Euramerica and Gondwana were beginning to converge into what would become Pangea.

means.word_mean: (线条、运动的物体等)会于一点, 向一点会合

sentences.en: The roads converged at the stadium.
sentences.cn: 各条道路在体育场会聚。

sentences.en: Our previously opposed views are beginning to converge.
sentences.cn: 我们原来相互对立的观点开始趋于一致。

jushi.english: Their views are beginning to converge.
jushi.chinese: 他们的观点开始趋于一致。
